However, due to Ghana’s housing deficit, developers find means and ways to provide housing units in Ghana. The lack of affordable housing is one of the most pertinent problems Ghana faces. Therefore, this article will focus on well planned and developed estate houses built by professional developers at affordable prices and ideal locations.
